title: My Profile
subtitle: View and manage your personal information

documents.description: Upload clear scans or photos of your documents for verification
documents.citizenshipFrontDesc: Front side of your citizenship certificate
documents.citizenshipBackDesc: Back side of your citizenship certificate

verification.description: Track the status of your profile verification process
verification.verifiedDesc: Your identity has been verified successfully. You have full access to all services.
verification.pendingDesc: Your profile is being reviewed by our verification team. This typically takes 1-3 business days.
verification.actionDesc: There are issues with your submission that need to be addressed. Please check below for details.
